newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary forint ends steady versus dlr at 179.45/50.
newsitem.headline: Hungary forint ends steady versus dlr at 179.45/50.

text.p: Hungary's forint ended unchanged against the dollar in quiet Tuesday afternoon trade which tracked the dollar/mark, dealers said.
The forint closed right on the National Bank of Hungary (NBH)'s resistance level (bid) at 179.45/50 to one dollar, the same as its midday level and hardly changed from its 179.50/55 opening.
"It was a very quiet day with the forint tracking the dollar/mark and moving only five pips at most from the central bank bid," said Laszlo Egyed of WestLB Hungaria.
Dealers did not foresee anything on the domestic market that could move the forint inside the intervention band.
The forint floats within the NBH's 4.5 percent wide intervention range against a currency basket made up 30 percent of the dollar and 70 percent of the mark.
